title: Baked Pork Chops   Low Fat Version

content.text: 6 center cut pork chops, trimmed of any visible fat
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "6 center cut pork chops, trimmed of any visible fat" )

content.text: 1 teaspoon garlic powder
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 teaspoon garlic powder" )

content.text: 1/2 teaspoon seasoning salt
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1/2 teaspoon seasoning salt" )

content.text: 1 egg, beaten with
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 egg, beaten with" )

content.text: 1/4 cup egg substitute
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1/4 cup egg substitute" )

content.text: 1/4 cup all-purpose flour
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "1/4 cup all-purpose flour" )

content.text: 2 cups Italian-style seasoned bread crumbs
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "2 cups Italian-style seasoned bread crumbs" )

content.text: 2 tablespoons olive oil
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "2 tablespoons olive oil" )

content.text: canola cooking spray
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "canola cooking spray" )

content.text: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  reduced fat condensed cream of mushroom soup
content.eamr: ( ing-9 "1 (10.75 ounce) can  reduced fat condensed cream of mushroom soup" )

content.text: 1/2 cup 1% low-fat milk
content.eamr: ( ing-10 "1/2 cup 1% low-fat milk" )

content.text: 1/3 cup white wine
content.eamr: ( ing-11 "1/3 cup white wine" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Rinse pork chops, pat dry, and season with garlic powder and seasoning salt to taste.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Rinse"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "pork chops"@9:19 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "pat"@21:24 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-2 "season"@34:40 / AC
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "garlic powder"@46:59 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "seasoning salt"@64:78 / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-1-0 "to taste"@79:87 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Place the beaten egg and egg substitute mixture in a small bowl.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "the beaten egg"@9:23 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "egg substitute mixture"@28:50 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-2-0 "a small bowl"@54:66 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Dredge the pork chops lightly in flour, dip in the egg, and coat liberally with bread crumbs.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Dredge"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( "the pork chops"@10:24 / FOOD )
		:loc ( ing-5 "flour"@36:41 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "dip"@43:46 / AC
		:gol ( "the egg"@50:57 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-2 "coat"@63:67 / AC
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "bread crumbs"@83:95 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "the olive oil"@8:21 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "a large skillet"@25:40 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "medium-high heat"@46:62 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Place the pork chops in the pan and coat the tops with canola cooking spray.
6) Fry the pork chops 5 minutes per side, or until the breading appears well browned.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Fry"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( "the pork chops"@7:21 / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "5 minutes"@22:31 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until the breading appears well browned"@45:84 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Transfer the chops to a 9x13 inch baking dish, and cover with foil.
8) Bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:loc ( tool-8-0 "the preheated oven"@11:29 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-8-0 "1 hour"@34:40 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 9) While baking, combine the cream of mushroom soup, milk, and white wine in a medium bowl.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "combine"@18:25 / AC
		:while ( cond-9-0 "While baking"@4:16 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "the cream of mushroom soup"@26:52 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "milk"@54:58 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "white wine"@64:74 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-9-0 "a medium bowl"@78:91 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 10) After the pork chops have baked for an hour, cover them with the soup mixture.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "cover"@49:54 / AC
		:ppt ( "them"@55:59 / PRONOUN )
		:ppt ( "the soup mixture"@65:81 / FOOD )
		:duration ( cond-10-0 "After the pork chops have baked for an hour"@4:47 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 11) Replace foil, and bake for another 30 minutes.
